reviewText: Truly an excellent purchase, as you get 4 DVD movies for a really good price. Denzel Washington just doesn't make a bad movie. "Fallen" was totally unexpected. A very odd premise, but very worth watching until the end. "Training Day" was really full of twists and turns and the plot was incredibly complicated. When you finally understand what has happened, you realize how much you missed by watching it only one time. The other 2 were great acting on his part. He just is one of our finest actors.  The DVD was sent quickly and arrived in excellent condition.

I am a big fan of Denzel Washington. He was electrifying as as an investigative reporter. The movie was believable and well thought out. Julie Roberts was brilliant in her portrayal as a college student. She could play any movie roll with poise and is a wonderful actress.

I enjoyed this 4 film dvd of Denzel Washington.

He makes you feel you are there in the action with him.  He is a fantastic actor.

I was pleased to be able to purchase this through Amazon. Com.

I am not a fan of this type of DVD, but for the money and to get two movies I really wanted for a small cost - it was worth it. The quality if great.. No playing issues at all.

They could make a movie of Denzel reading the phone book and I would buy it. And watch it. Again and again. The movies themselves are great. My only complaint is the formatting. For some reason, these do not give the option to select scenes. So if you are looking for a specific scene in any of the movies, you have to fast forward to find it. However, these are four great films. One thing I do have to say after watching The Pelican Brief for the first time in many years: the young Julia Roberts was out of her league with an otherwise outstanding cast. Obviously they were going for the big box office draw in casting America's Sweetheart du jour (circa 1993), but  - wow - was her performance ever a ham fest! The pursing lips! The melodramatic facial expressions! The mugging for the camera! Oy vey... Still, it is a solid film overall.

I have become a Denzel fan. Fallen is one of my favorite films. Pelican Brief has some very excellent acting in it from Denzel and Julia Roberts. John Q has a desperate but dignified quality about it. Training Day is unexpected. But, I liked them all.
I enjoy ordering items that can and will be a blessing to others.  I am for sure that every person will enjoy a small gift of appreication.

John Q. and the Pelican Brief are great movies and these two alone make this a good deal.  However, the other two just took up my time. In each case, the movie started out great and looked to be well worth watching.  But in each case (Training Day and Fallen) the film changed  gears the last half hour and absolutely ruined what otherwise would have been a good flick.

Since I first started watching any of his films, it didn't matter what kind of movie it would be, I was just so captivated. Not only does Denzel do a great job acting, but he makes you believe he's that person in real life. From making him want to love/hate him as a crooked cop in 'Training Day' to making you empathize as a parent in desperate need in 'John Q' these films are well worth the purchase!
I am building a Denzel Washington collection. Denzel showed signs of his potential in the medical Tv series classic St, Elsewhere. The opportunity to get 4 of his movies for the price of 1.

This dvd stopped working after 5 minutes of play. It just froze and we could never get it to advance past that frame. It's unfortunate because this would have been a great Christmas gift. I don't recommend this product.
I would have selected 5 stars but I never received a reply regarding the return of one of the movies which did not play on my DVD player, I feel cheated.

Each D.W. project is unique.  Each is a strong performance.  He inhabits a character and makes you care about that person, what happens to him, and how he affects others.  As a recent suicide survivor, I needed some entertainment to take my mind off cleaning house and sorting paperwork; this collection did that, but it is also a permanent addition to my collection of great movies.

This is a great selection of movies showcasing Denzel Washington's acting talent !!!  I really like the fact that they include some of his lesser known films, that by the way are great!!!  I was also happy to see these films are presented in widescreen...when I was a kid I hated those black bars, but as a adult artist I realize when a movie is formatted to fit your T.V. it is cutting the ends of the picture off.  This would be like showing the painting of " The Last Supper" with Jesus & 10 Apostles.  I would like to say more about the awesome movies in this collection but I don't want to give out any spoilers.  Lets just say every one of these movies has you on the edge of your seat!!!
Really good movies. I think Denzel Washington is a wonderful actor.
